title: BNY's Levine: Inflation Will Be Higher Than Expected
itunes:title: BNY's Levine: Inflation Will Be Higher Than Expected
description:
Alicia Levine, Chief Strategist at BNY Mellon, on how the inflation issue will color markets. Jeffrey Rosenberg, Portfolio Manager of the BlackRock Systematic Multi-Strategy Fund, on why there's not much value left in fixed income markets. Molly Schuetz, U.S. technology editor for Bloomberg, on Amazon workers voting against joining a retail union. Brad Repke, Senior Wealth Advisor at Mainstay Capital Management, on this year’s ENGAGE Undergraduate Investment Conference, the largest collegiate investment conference in North America. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
